channel.title: Alpha0.0 (Runescape Remake the way it should of been)F2p currently
channel.description:
[center]Alpha0.0 (Runescape Remake the way it should of been)
Server is Currently in F2p mode Firstly hey moparscape I have been working on this project sometime beggining of july not sure exact date.Why?because before i had exams which i had to study for..and this summer i am working on this server making it look really nice/making it look how runescape should of been designed.
Not sure which [u]source[/u] i had took all i know is that its [u]delta[/u].I did start this project from scratch--it does not currently eat,did not have opening doors,did not have items being worn in right places,had no npc's,does not currently have any drops.
What i have done what i am working on currently what i havent started
[u]What i have done and what i am working on currently[/u] adding npc's adding food that character can eat adding shops adding items in correct equipment slot. adding drops adding opening doors Combat working 100% working firemaking 100%--currently 45%
Will add pictures Tomrrow i am currently on Laptop also will right more in detail tomrrow.[/center]

item.description:
@Ryan_Connolly wrote:

Goodluck! Don’t see this going far, but feel free to prove me wrong.

item.description:
@bobby11 wrote:

[center]Alpha0.0 (Runescape Remake the way it should of been)

Server is Currently in F2p mode
Firstly hey moparscape I have been working on this project sometime beggining of july not sure exact date.Why?because before i had exams which i had to study for…and this summer i am working on this server making it look really nice/making it look how runescape should of been designed.

Not sure which source i had took all i know is that its delta.I did start this project from scratch–it does not currently eat,did not have opening doors,did not have items being worn in right places,had no npc’s,does not currently have any drops.

What i have done
what i am working on currently
what i havent started

What i have done and what i am working on currently
adding npc’s
adding food that character can eat
adding shops
adding items in correct equipment slot.
adding drops
adding opening doors
Combat working 100%
working firemaking 100%–currently 45%

Will add pictures Tomrrow i am currently on Laptop also will right more in detail tomrrow.[/center]
